entities.name: karkaroff
entities.description: Karkaroff is mentioned as a person who has names to share with Mr. Crouch.

entities.name: he-who-must-not-be-named
entities.description: He-Who-Must-Not-Be-Named is mentioned as the one who operated in secrecy and knew the identities of his supporters.

entities.name: moody
entities.description: Moody is mentioned as a person who makes a comment about Karkaroff's potential to turn others in.

entities.name: mr. crouch
entities.description: Mr. Crouch is mentioned as the one who asks Karkaroff for names and seems skeptical of his claims.

relationships.description: Karkaroff mentions that He-Who-Must-Not-Be-Named was his supporter, indicating a relationship between the two.
Moody makes a comment about Karkaroff's potential to turn others in, indicating that Moody is commenting on Karkaroff.
Mr. Crouch asks Karkaroff for names, indicating a request from Mr. Crouch to Karkaroff.
